step.datasource:
INSERT INTO dbo._AB_tb_ABEI_OrderPriceUpdate ([db] ,[ord_soort],[ordernr],[ID],[regel],[artcode],[oms45],[esr_aantal] ,[prijslijst],[prijs_n_old],[prijs83_old],[korting_old],[bdr_ev_ed_val] ,[bdr_d_ev_val],[bdr_vat_val],[bdr_inv_d_val],[bdr_val],[prijs83],[prijs_n] ,[fiattering],[ordbv_afdr],[ordbv_afgd],[runid],[rowstatus] ,reverted ,debnr ,fakdebnr ,ord_contactemail ,inv_contactemail ,emailsent ,accmanmail ,old_represent_id ,represent_id )
SELECT '%abeisourcedb%' as db , k.ord_soort, k.ordernr, r.ID, r.regel, r.artcode, r.oms45, r.esr_aantal, r.prijslijst, r.prijs_n as prijs_n_old, r.prijs83 as prijs83_old, r.korting as korting_old , r.bdr_ev_ed_val, r.bdr_d_ev_val, r.bdr_vat_val, r.bdr_inv_d_val, r.bdr_val
, CAST(ROUND(r.prijs83 * 1.065,2) as decimal(16,2)) as prijs83 , CAST(ROUND(r.prijs_n * 1.065,2) as decimal(16,2)) as prijs_n
, k.fiattering , k.ordbv_afdr , k.ordbv_afgd
, '%runid%' , 1 as rowstatus , 0 as reverted ,k.debnr ,k.fakdebnr ,k.ord_contactemail ,k.inv_contactemail ,0 as emailsent ,ISNULL(h.mail,'ISS@orlaco.com') as accmanmail ,k.represent_id ,CASE WHEN ISNULL( h.ldatuitdienst, '2099-01-01' ) < '2022-01-26' THEN 10710 ELSE h.res_id END as represent_id FROM [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.orkrg k WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.orsrg r WITH (NOLOCK) ON r.ordernr = k.ordernr INNER JOIN [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.cicmpy c WITH (NOLOCK) ON c.debnr = k.debnr INNER JOIN [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.humres h with (NOLOCK) on h.res_id = k.represent_id WHERE 1=1 AND k.afgehandld = 0 -- Open orders AND k.ord_soort = 'Q' -- Quotations AND r.ar_soort != 'P' -- Exclude condition lines AND r.artcode NOT LIKE 'TXT%' -- exclude text items as spot buy, ZCOM and MAN AND r.uitgifte = 0 and r.pakbon_afg = 0 -- Open rows AND r.reeds_fakt = 0 -- include delivered but not invoiced rows and r.prijs_n > 0.1 -- Exclude zero and negative rows AND ISNULL(k.debnr,'') not in ( SELECT DISTINCT ce.debnr collate database_default FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_PriceUpdate23_ExclAccounts] ce where division = '%abeisourcedb%' ) AND ISNULL(k.fakdebnr,'') not in ( SELECT DISTINCT ce.debnr collate database_default FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_PriceUpdate23_ExclAccounts] ce where division = '%abeisourcedb%' ) AND ISNULL(k.verzdebnr,'') not in ( SELECT DISTINCT ce.debnr collate database_default FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_PriceUpdate23_ExclAccounts] ce where division = '%abeisourcedb%' ) AND ISNULL(r.prijslijst,'') not in ( SELECT DISTINCT pe.Pricelist collate database_default FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_PriceUpdate23_PricelistList] pe WITH (NOLOCK) ) and k.syscreated < '2022-12-19' -- quotions created before 19-12-2022 --and r.afldat >= '2023-01-01' -- delivery date in 2023 and (r.korting <= -6.6 or r.korting >= -6.4 ) -- don't update rows that already have the new price AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM dbo._AB_tb_ABEI_OrderPriceUpdate o WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND o.db = '%abeisourcedb%' AND o.ID = r.ID)

SELECT TOP (100) o.ordernr as HeaderID , o.ordernr , o.ID -- , o.prijs83 --, o.prijs_n , o.prijs83_old as prijs83 , o.prijs_n_old as prijs_n , o.represent_id as res_id FROM dbo._AB_tb_ABEI_OrderPriceUpdate o WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.orsrg r WITH (NOLOCK) ON r.ID = o.ID WHERE 1=1 AND o.rowstatus = 1 AND o.db = '%abeitargetdb%' AND o.prijs83 > 0 AND o.ord_soort = 'Q'
--AND (r.prijs83 <> o.prijs83 -- OR r.prijs_n <> o.prijs_n)
AND o.reverted = 1 AND ( abs(r.prijs83 - o.prijs83_old) > 0.01 OR abs(r.prijs_n - o.prijs_n_old) > 0.01)
-- Test --AND o.ordernr = '12017403'--'11640141'--'11913948'--'11907729'--'11640141' ORDER BY o.ordernr, o.ID

WITH orderlines AS ( SELECT TOP (100) o.ordernr as HeaderID , o.ordernr , o.ID , o.prijs83 , o.prijs_n , o.represent_id FROM dbo._AB_tb_ABEI_OrderPriceUpdate o WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.orsrg r WITH (NOLOCK) ON r.ID = o.ID WHERE 1=1 AND o.rowstatus = 1 AND o.db = '%abeitargetdb%' AND o.prijs83 > 0 AND o.ord_soort = 'Q'
--AND (r.prijs83 <> o.prijs83 -- OR r.prijs_n <> o.prijs_n)
AND o.reverted = 1 AND ( abs(r.prijs83 - o.prijs83_old) > 0.01 OR abs(r.prijs_n - o.prijs_n_old) > 0.01)
ORDER BY o.ordernr, o.ID ) SELECT DISTINCT HeaderID, ordernr , represent_id FROM orderlines

SELECT o.ordernr as HeaderID , o.ordernr , o.ID , o.prijs_n FROM dbo._AB_tb_ABEI_OrderPriceUpdate o WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.orsrg r WITH (NOLOCK) ON r.ID = o.ID WHERE 1=1 AND o.rowstatus = 1 AND o.db = '%abeitargetdb%' AND o.prijs83 > 0 AND o.ord_soort = 'Q'
AND o.prijs_n = 0 AND (r.prijs_n <> o.prijs_n)
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM [%abeidb%].dbo._AB_Entity_results r WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND r.jobid = %jobid% AND r.runid = '%runid%' AND r.Entity = 'SalesOrderLine' AND r.[action] = 'update' AND r.TargetDB = '%abeitargetdb%' AND r.HeaderID = o.ordernr COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT )

SELECT DISTINCT o.ordernr as HeaderID , o.ordernr FROM dbo._AB_tb_ABEI_OrderPriceUpdate o WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.orsrg r WITH (NOLOCK) ON r.ID = o.ID WHERE 1=1 AND o.rowstatus = 1 AND o.db = '%abeitargetdb%' AND o.prijs83 > 0 AND o.ord_soort = 'Q'
AND o.prijs_n = 0 AND (r.prijs_n <> o.prijs_n)
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM [%abeidb%].dbo._AB_Entity_results r WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND r.jobid = %jobid% AND r.runid = '%runid%' AND r.Entity = 'SalesOrderLine' AND r.[action] = 'update' AND r.TargetDB = '%abeitargetdb%' AND r.HeaderID = o.ordernr COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT )
step.stepname: Update order to 0 for DB - Header

step.datasource:
UPDATE o WITH (ROWLOCK, NOWAIT) SET -- SELECT rowstatus = 2 , runid = '%runid%' , sysmodified = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP FROM dbo._AB_tb_ABEI_OrderPriceUpdate o INNER JOIN [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.orsrg r WITH (NOLOCK) ON r.ID = o.ID WHERE 1=1 AND o.rowstatus = 1 AND o.db = '%abeisourcedb%' AND o.prijs83 > 0 AND o.ord_soort = 'Q'
--AND r.prijs83 = o.prijs83 --AND r.prijs_n = o.prijs_n
AND o.reverted = 1 AND ( abs(r.prijs83 - o.prijs83_old) < 0.01 OR abs(r.prijs_n - o.prijs_n_old) < 0.01)

SELECT CASE WHEN l.ct > 0 THEN 100 ELSE 9020 END as seqno FROM ( SELECT COUNT(o.ID) as ct FROM [ABSC_Data].dbo._AB_tb_ABEI_OrderPriceUpdate o WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND o.db = '%abeisourcedb%' AND o.rowstatus = 1 AND o.ord_soort = 'Q' ) l
